title: "Childtime Childrens Center"
---

```{r setup}
#| include: false

library(tidyverse)
options(scipen = 999)
```

```{r}
#| include: false

center <- "Childtime Childrens Center"

center_data <- read_csv("childcare-centers.csv") %>%
  filter(Provider_Name == center) 
```

## Basic Information

Address: `r center_data$Address`

Ages Served: `r center_data$Ages`

Maximum Capacity: `r center_data$Max_Capacity`

Accepts Vouchers? `r center_data$Subsidized_Childcare`

Tuition Insight: `r center_data$Tuition_Insight`

## License

License Number: `r center_data$License_Number`

License Type: `r center_data$Type`

## Learn More

Phone: `r center_data$Phone`

Website: [`r center_data$Website`](%60r%20center_data$Website%60){target="“_blank”"}

Use the center name or license number to search for state records at [`r center_data$State_Link`](%60r%20center_data$State_Link%60){target="“_blank”"}.
